welcome_message_body: Welcome to Anthony, a charming city known for its rich history and warm hospitality. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Paso International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is primarily used for regional flights and is connected to the main terminal via a covered walkway.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggs AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Abraham Gonzalez International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for up to 2 hours.
